attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2013-1502

Date: 2013-12-17

   Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que Jerome A. Tholl, de la ville de Regina dans la province de la Saskatchewan, avocat, soit nommé juge de la Cour du Banc de la Reine de la Saskatchewan.


   The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that Jerome A. Tholl, of the City of Regina in the Province of Saskatchewan, Barrister-at-law, be appointed a Judge of Her Majesty's Court of Queen's Bench for Saskatchewan.
